#summary An overview of the changes in the different revisions of junixsocket, including recent changes in SVN trunk

= Changelog =

== _(unreleased)_ *junixsocket 1.3* ==

   Current work as on SVN trunk. Changes marked for 1.3 can be accessed [http://code.google.com/p/junixsocket/issues/list?can=1&q=milestone%3ARelease1.3+status%3AFixed%2CVerified%2CDone&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+Milestone+Owner+Summary&cells=tiles here].

   * Solaris support.
   * `InputStream#available()` now returns values > 0 ([http://code.google.com/p/junixsocket/issues/detail?id=11 Issue 11])
   * Added explicit mapping of `java.net.SocketOptions` values ([http://code.google.com/p/junixsocket/issues/detail?id=12 Issue 12])
   * Improved some warnings and error messages
   * Improved build process

== _(2010-04-22)_ *junixsocket 1.2 released.*==

   * [http://code.google.com/p/junixsocket/issues/list?can=1&q=milestone%3ARelease1.2+status%3AFixed%2CVerified%2CDone&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+Milestone+Owner+Summary&cells=tiles Bugfixes and improvements]. 
   * [http://code.google.com/p/junixsocket/wiki/ConnectingToMySQL MySQL unix socket factory] now available as a separate jar (and with demo code)
   * Now compiles under FreeBSD.
   * Initial support for Tru64.
   * Improved handling of stale socket files.

== _(2009-12-03)_ *junixsocket 1.1 released.*==
